mapper.select:
select count(*) from game_info
AND game_title like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
select review_id from review_list where game_id = #{gameId}

select category_name from category_list where category_id in ( (select game_category_id1 from game_info where game_id = #{gameId}) , (select game_category_id2 from game_info where game_id = #{gameId}) , (select game_category_id3 from game_info where game_id = #{gameId}) , (select game_category_id4 from game_info where game_id = #{gameId}) )

select category_id, category_name, count(*) as category_count from game_info g join category_list c on g.game_category_id1 = c.category_id or g.game_category_id2 = c.category_id or g.game_category_id3 = c.category_id or g.game_category_id4 = c.category_id group by category_id order by category_name
